oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb Mukālamāt ʻArabīyah : manuscript, [ca. 1783]
Mukālamāt ʻArabīyah
Recueil de dialogues en arabe avec la traduction française en regard
Maqālah al-thālithah fī baʻḍ ḥikāyāt al-daḥkīyah li-taʻlīm al-qawl al-ʻalim fī al-lughah al-ʻarabīyah
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: المقالة الأولى في حروف العربية ووضعهم في الكلام أول ذلك علىيد اليمين على جانب الشمال... :Incipit

Ownership statement: "Ṣāhibuhu [sic] al-muznib [sic] al-faqīr Qārdūn [Denis Dominique Cardonne?] tarjumān al-Farānsāwī fī madīnat Ṭarābulus al-Shām ḥālan, ʻufiya ʻanhu." There is also a seal of Qārdūn dated 1198 AH [1783 or 4 AD] (fly leaf 1).
Written in two columns, 12 lines per page, in black and red.
MS Arab SM321. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
